mobiheader.fullname: EasyScript Express How to Take Fast and Legible Notes in a Matter of Hours

exthheader.author: Levin, Leonard
exthheader.description:
EasyScript (ES) is an easy alternative to any traditional shorthand and speedwriting method. ES does not require extensive memorization and a long learning time. It is English Grammar-based alphabetic method utilizing a small set of rules. 
All words are broken down into five (5) categories with one rule assigned for one specific category.  As a result, you will be learning 5 basic rules to abbreviate any word reducing significantly the learning curve. You need only to have knowledge of prefixes and suffixes of the English language to master it quickly.
The abbreviating rules can be customized to user's style and application. You can combine ES with any other method and apply it for words you don't have any abbreviations for. Imagine being able to write twice as fast as you do now. As opposed to existing systems EasyScript is logical and it makes sense. It's proven effective by people of almost all occupations from salespersons to managers and secretaries and students. 
For the last 20 years ES received high approval ratings and it is gaining popularity in the United States and many other regions of the world. The EasyScript demo can be viewed at easyscript.com. Optional ComputerScript software is available to expand abbreviations into readable text.
exthheader.updatedtitle: EasyScript Express How to Take Fast and Legible Notes in a Matter of Hours
